title: Nick tries to call Gatsby's house but the line is busy. He makes a note of the three-fifty train and tries to think.
text:
d—and loved me more even then, do you see?”

Suddenly he came out with a curious remark.

“In any case,” he said, “it was just personal.”

What could you make of that, except to suspect

relations.explanation: Gatsby states that Daisy might have loved Tom "just for a minute, when they were first married".
